intent_atoms.description: Implement traversal guard logic, fixtures, and telemetry as defined in the specified documentation.
Wire decoder failure issues into CLI/app summaries once aggregation APIs land.
Schedule macOS and iPadOS hardware verification to confirm focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets for VoiceOver regression pass.
Secure Dolby Vision, AV1 etc fixtures so regression baselines can shift from synthetic payloads once approvals land.
Refresh snapshots and CLI fixtures whenever schema updates are intentional via ISOINSPECTER_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOT...

functional_units.name: Traversal Guard Implementation
functional_units.description: Implements guard logic, fixtures, and telemetry for traversal guard as per specified documentation.

functional_units.name: Tolerant Parsing – Surface Issues in Downstream Consumers
functional_units.description: Wires decoder failure issues into CLI/app summaries once aggregation APIs are available, tracking roadmap context.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Schedules macOS/iPadOS hardware verification to ensure focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets.

functional_units.name: Real-World Assets Acquisition
functional_units.description: Secures Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures for regression baselines after licensing approvals.

functional_units.name: Snapshot & CLI Fixture Maintenance
functional_units.description: Refreshes snapshots and CLI fixtures when schema updates occur using specified test command.
